description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Chicken & Fattoush Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Tomato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Grilled Chicken & Fattoush Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small continental cucumber, halved lengthwise, diagonally sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Whisk sumac, oil, juice and garlic together and season with salt and pepper.
Brush both sides of the bread with a little of the dressing and place on a large baking paper lined oven tray. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Cool.

Brush chicken with a little of the remaining dressing. Heat a barbecue or chargrill over medium-high heat and cook chicken for 3-4 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove from heat and rest. Slice.
Top bread with remaining ingredients, chicken and remaining dressing. Serve.
